attributes.action: ISN'T IT ABOUT TIME SINGLE MOTHERS OF TWENTY CHILDREN AND ALL WITH DIFFERENT FATHERS DIDN'T GET ALL OUR HARD EARNED TAXES!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some single parents get SKY TV, rent, a home, new kitchens, bathrooms, full decoration, free workmen, lunches for their children, driving lessons, numorous benefits and perks.  Once they go to work, even for a few hours a week - it all stops! Sorry, but am i the only one thinking that this is an incentive to stay out of work and keep having children? Shouldn't there be real incentives to help them work and i don't mean enforced childcare. can't our government help WORKING families more instead?

rejection.details: Please re-submit without using BLOCK CAPS as they are more difficult for people to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
